definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
at first/suddenly/abruptly/to spread/(of hair) to stand on end/bristling
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

sentences.english: With all of those bleary -eyed check-ins comes a new emphasis on certain amenities.
sentences.chinese: 對新來乍到者先留意的是某些設施。

sentences.english: It always takes time to get used to a new place.
sentences.chinese: 新來乍到，總要過些時候纔會習慣。

sentences.english: We're newcomers here and must be careful what we do.
sentences.chinese: 我們新來乍到，得注意自己的一舉一動。

sentences.english: You're a new arrival, not too familiar with bern.
sentences.chinese: 你新來乍到，對伯爾尼情況也不太熟悉。
